comment.author: 8850207@N07
comment._content: The heart of this image is the expression on the postman's face. Rather than the expected look of of exhaustion from his burden, he is smiling as he glances at the package he is about to deliver, as though reflecting on the joy this gift may bring to someone. Thus, the spirit of giving, so characteristic of the season, is clearly captured by the artist.

comment.author: 15446859@N06
comment._content:
American Cyanimide was purchased by the company known as Wyeth which is being bought by Pfizer.  AC was famous for production of the Polio vaccine.  Wyeth produced products like birth control pills and flu vaccine.  They currently produce Prevnar which prevents pneumonia.  I assume this was a greeting card sent by the company during the holiday season.
